verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, unto Moses בֹּ֖א <S%H935><s%> bo Go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh; in unto Pharaoh כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I הִכְבַּ֤דְתִּי <S%H3513><s%> hich-Bad-ti for I have hardened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לִבּוֹ֙ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo his heart וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> lev and the heart עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav, of his servants לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an, because of שִׁתִ֛י <S%H7896><s%> shi-Ti that I might shew אֹתֹתַ֥י <S%H226><s%> 'o-to-Tai these my signs אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-bov. before

וּלְמַ֡עַן <S%H4616><s%> u-le-Ma-'an because of תְּסַפֵּר֩ <S%H5608><s%> te-sap-Per And that thou mayest tell בְּאָזְנֵ֨י <S%H241><s%> be-'a-ze-Nei in the ears בִנְךָ֜ <S%H1121><s%> vin-Cha of thy son וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ven- and of thy son's בִּנְךָ֗ <S%H1121><s%> bin-Cha, son אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher and how הִתְעַלַּ֙לְתִּי֙ <S%H5953><s%> hit-'al-Lal-ti what things I have wrought בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim, in Egypt וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֹתֹתַ֖י <S%H226><s%> 'o-to-Tai and my signs אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- and how שַׂ֣מְתִּי <S%H7760><s%> Sam-ti which I have done בָ֑ם Vam; וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem among them that ye may know כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. how that I [am] the LORD

וַיָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came in מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses וְאַהֲרֹן֮ <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron and Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹה֒ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh unto Pharaoh וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God הָֽעִבְרִ֔ים <S%H5680><s%> ha-'iv-Rim, of the Hebrews עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against מָתַ֣י <S%H4970><s%> ma-Tai How long מֵאַ֔נְתָּ <S%H3985><s%> me-'An-ta, wilt thou refuse לֵעָנֹ֖ת <S%H6031><s%> le-'a-Not to humble מִפָּנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Nai; thyself before שַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> shal-Lach go עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi me;let my people וְיַֽעַבְדֻֽנִי׃ <S%H5647><s%> ve-Ya-'av-Du-ni. that they may serve

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki Else אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if מָאֵ֥ן <S%H3986><s%> ma-'En if thou refuse אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you לְשַׁלֵּ֣חַ <S%H7971><s%> le-shal-Le-ach go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi; to let my people הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold מֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> me-Vi will I bring מָחָ֛ר <S%H4279><s%> ma-Char behold to morrow אַרְבֶּ֖ה <S%H697><s%> 'ar-Beh the locusts בִּגְבֻלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1366><s%> big-vu-Le-cha. into thy coast

וְכִסָּה֙ <S%H3680><s%> ve-chis-Sah And they shall cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵ֣ין <S%H5869><s%> 'ein the face הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, of the earth וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo no יוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> yu-Chal that one cannot be able לִרְאֹ֣ת <S%H7200><s%> lir-'Ot to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the earth וְאָכַ֣ל׀ <S%H398><s%> ve-'a-Chal and they shall eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> Ye-ter the residue הַפְּלֵטָ֗ה <S%H6413><s%> hap-pe-le-Tah, of that which is escaped הַנִּשְׁאֶ֤רֶת <S%H7604><s%> han-nish-'E-ret which remaineth לָכֶם֙ la-Chem מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַבָּרָ֔ד <S%H1259><s%> hab-ba-Rad, unto you from the hail וְאָכַל֙ <S%H398><s%> ve-'a-Chal and shall eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every הָעֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> ha-'Etz, every tree הַצֹּמֵ֥חַ <S%H6779><s%> hatz-tzo-Me-ach which groweth לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- out הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh. for you out of the field

וּמָלְא֨וּ <S%H4390><s%> u-mal-'U And they shall fill בָתֶּ֜יךָ <S%H1004><s%> vat-Tei-cha thy houses וּבָתֵּ֣י <S%H1004><s%> u-vat-Tei and the houses כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol of all עֲבָדֶיךָ֮ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-dei-Cha of all thy servants וּבָתֵּ֣י <S%H1004><s%> u-vat-Tei and the houses כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol of all מִצְרַיִם֒ <S%H4713><s%> mitz-ra-Yim Egyptian אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- neither רָא֤וּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U have seen אֲבֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-cha which neither thy fathers וַאֲב֣וֹת <S%H1><s%> va-'a-Vot nor thy fathers' אֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-cha, fathers מִיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> mi-Yom, since the day הֱיוֹתָם֙ <S%H1961><s%> he-yo-Tam came עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, that they were upon the earth עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad until הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this וַיִּ֥פֶן <S%H6437><s%> vai-Yi-fen And he turned וַיֵּצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze himself and went out מֵעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> me-'Im from פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh. from Pharaoh

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said עַבְדֵ֨י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei servants פַרְעֹ֜ה <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh And Pharaoh's אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- to him מָתַי֙ <S%H4970><s%> ma-Tai How יִהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh will this לָ֙נוּ֙ la-nu לְמוֹקֵ֔שׁ <S%H4170><s%> le-mo-Kesh, unto him How long shall this man be a snare שַׁלַּח֙ <S%H7971><s%> shal-Lach go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim, the men וְיַֽעַבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> ve-ya-'av-Du that they may serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; their God הֲטֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> ha-Te-rem thou not yet תֵּדַ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> te-Da', knowest כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָבְדָ֖ה <S%H6><s%> 'a-ve-Dah is destroyed מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. that Egypt

וַיּוּשַׁ֞ב <S%H7725><s%> vai-yu-Shav were brought again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֤ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, unto Pharaoh וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and he said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, to לְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu [but] who [are] they that shall go עִבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> 'iv-Du serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem; your God מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who וָמִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> va-Mi Who הַהֹלְכִֽים׃ <S%H1980><s%> ha-ho-le-Chim. Go

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses בִּנְעָרֵ֥ינוּ <S%H5288><s%> bin-'a-Rei-nu with our young וּבִזְקֵנֵ֖ינוּ <S%H2205><s%> u-viz-ke-Nei-nu and with our old נֵלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ne-Lech; shall go בְּבָנֵ֨ינוּ <S%H1121><s%> be-va-Nei-nu with our sons וּבִבְנוֹתֵ֜נוּ <S%H1323><s%> u-viv-no-Te-nu and with our daughters בְּצֹאנֵ֤נוּ <S%H6629><s%> be-tzo-Ne-nu with our flocks וּבִבְקָרֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H1241><s%> u-viv-ka-Re-nu and with our herds נֵלֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ne-Lech, shall go כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for חַג־ <S%H2282><s%> chag- for we [must hold] a feast יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

[is] before

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Not כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Chen, so לְכֽוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> le-chu- Go נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> na now הַגְּבָרִים֙ <S%H1397><s%> hag-ge-va-Rim now ye [that are] men וְעִבְד֣וּ <S%H5647><s%> ve-'iv-Du and serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you מְבַקְשִׁ֑ים <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Shim; for that ye did desire וַיְגָ֣רֶשׁ <S%H1644><s%> vay-Ga-resh And they were driven out אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei presence פַרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh. from Pharaoh's פ Peh

[even] all that the hail
